A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Better than The Force Awakens\, yet it didn’t hit the mark for me. Seems like Disney is hiring the biggest guns possible to help make Star Wars a fan favorite again with a new trilogy that seems to be as confused of the direction it’s heading\, like Kylo Ren himself. No matter how much Disney invests in this or any other Star Wars trilogy\, seems like nothing can surpass Empire Strikes Back.
